name: placeless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to many other places and with no special character, or resulting in places like this : His buildings exhibit another feature of the International Style: they are placeless. A good local pub is the ultimate antidote to placeless globalization.
not in, or connected with, any particular place: She began by writing stories that were deliberately placeless after coming to England in the 70s.
More examplesFewer examplesIn contrast to the exterior, so rooted in its place, the galleries come off as placeless.It has a timeless, placeless look: it could be anywhere in the world.Some filmmakers were making expensive films positioned in a European never-never-land, believing that placeless films were preferable to British films.
